mapper.select: select * from member where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${type} asc

select * from member
and instr(member_id,#{memberId}) > 0
and instr(member_nickname,#{memberNickname})>0
and instr(member_email,#{memberEmail})>0
and instr(member_contact,#{memberContact})>0
and instr(member_post,#{memberPost})>0
and to_date(member_birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_date(#{birthBegin}|| ' ' || '00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{birthEnd}||''|| '23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
to_date(member_birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_date(#{birthBegin}||''||'00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
to_date(member_birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= to_date(#{birthEnd}||''||'23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
